ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] dragons easier?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Vox seems to be about the same.  Consensus is that Nagafen was upgraded (as of about 1 week ago). There are just so many variables that go into these
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 30 Mar 2000, Greg Gillan wrote:
>
> Do dragons seem any easier to you guys? We killed Vox last night with 30ish
> people. 2 clerics, 1 bard, nobody died. Last time we killed her we also
> had no deaths. Nags was almost as easy.
> My guild is a great bunch of people, but I have trouble believing we're that
> good.
>
> Anyone else have an easier than normal time? Possible dragon nerf?

Vox seems to be about the same. Consensus is that Nagafen was
upgraded (as of about 1 week ago).

There are just so many variables that go into these things,
and you'll never see most of them because you have messages
turned off to cut down on spam, that we'll probably never know
for sure. Maybe something your casters did early on made a
big difference? Maybe Vox didn't use her AE breath attack as
much? Maybe she didn't dispel as much? There's just no way
to know for sure.

I only say consensus is that Nagafen was upgraded because
several guilds who used to be able to kill him on Karana were
unable to despite multiple attempts, and the two guilds we
expected would have no problems needed two attempts.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
